videos.headline: Wolverines dust off unique formation for TD
videos.description: Michigan breaks out of a unique formation before Jake Butt catches a touchdown, putting the Wolverines on the board against the Fighting Illini.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Wolverines dust off unique formation for TD) 2016/10/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Illinois breaks dry spell with deep ball TD
videos.description: The Fighting Illini's Malik Turner runs Jeff George Jr.'s deep throw into the end zone for Illinois' first TD against Michigan.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play ( Illinois breaks dry spell with deep ball TD) 2016/10/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Higdon shakes off Illinois defenders for 45-yard TD
videos.description: Michigan's Karan Higdon maneuvers through Illinois' defense for a 45-yard TD , putting the Wolverines up 41-8.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-PLay (Higdon shakes off Illinois defenders for 45-yard TD) 2016/10/22 ESHEET
